model: Stratos Cordless with Clean Sense IQ (IZ862H)
seo_keywords: Shark Stratos clean sense IQ not working

problems.title: Clean Sense IQ Not Working
problems.description: The suction doesn't auto-adjust or the light bar behaves erratically.
possible_causes: Sensors near the inlet are dirty
solution_steps: Wipe the infrared sensors inside the dust cup inlet with a dry cloth.
Clear any debris blocking the wand path.

problems.title: Bad Smell / Odor Dial Empty
problems.description: Vacuum smells or the dial icon shows empty.
solution_steps: Replace the cartridge in the floor nozzle.
Align the arrows when inserting the new cartridge.
